post.body: I skipped coffee for it today… and have been pleasantly satisfied!
Your HC cravings made me drink some today!!!
Haven't seen you much lately!
Eeek!
I'm fine!
Church of the Annunciation in Altamonte has the same Nativity set…
That's an eye-opener!
You'll never stop them all…
Can anyone make fun of you??
Still didn't fix the issue, huh?
Nice…
Did it work?
You probably need this sotware: http://tinyurl.com/3uvck
Go halfway down this page : http://tinyurl.com/55my6o
Trash the preference file.
HOLY MOLY! That's cold! I'm in shorts, no shoes and a T-shirt here!
It's very good this morn… A nice chocolate decadance. It's 71 and humid here this morning… UGH!
I just read that perhaps deleting the preferences file might correct this…
Must be Windows…
Have fun… enjoy the expensive parking!
There is a twitter… follow amazonmp3
She emailed me and asked if Iwas mad at her. Great.
Ok, I didn't outright kill the deal, but I priced myself at market value instead of under. Also set time milestones for her.
What kind of music do you work to? Personally, I have 90's dance music in here usually… other times… it's New Age.
Gave up on cover for now. Need to eat lunch…
My cover idea is NOT working!!!! Too much black!
Doing some festive-ish New Year's Design
Hot chocolate sounds good this morning!!
Sure is nice out today. Working on Lake Family Magazine this morning. Probably busting on a new website later too…
Come back to my office and find milk on my monitor! Where's my son!!!
Need... More... Clients...
Today is reminding me what I hate about offices.
Listening to meditation podcasts this morning to relax myself.
Yawn
I love the Bucs, but they are PAINFUL to watch.
Mag files just came in! ON TIME! OMG! (Whoa… still need the other half)
Monday. Monday… Should get the magazine files today.
Anyone doing magazine design… how many pages do you average laying out in a day?
Yay! Sun finally came back out!
Hot Chocolate Time!!!!
Calling it a day. Time to head to my mother-in-law's house for diner.
Broadcasting live now! See me at http://tinyurl.com/662xau
Loving clients that abuse my time.
NO! Marker Felt is NOT a cute font!!
Almost finished with the last magazine in a 6-month contract run. I sold myself waaaaaaaay to short on this job and Ipaid for it!
Why oh why does my next door neighbor feel compelled to walk the dogs in pajama bottoms and no shirt????
Oops: http://tinyurl.com/63madp
Working on a magazine today: http://tinyurl.com/5ve2ah
I'm tired of working today. 4 more pages left in this magazine issue. Enough is enough!
Does anyone know of a task management program that will reschedule tasks automatically?
I added more Christmas lights to my yard today. If I keep this up, it'll be like the Christmas Vacation movie soon! Hee Hee!
Cannot believe I'm about to do this: http://tinyurl.com/ybwu28
RT @amazonmp3: Awesome deal! http://snurl.com/8ojyl
Doing edits to magazine. Yay!
Sorry to my Canadian friends... It's 71 and sunny here in Orlando
WHAT THE?!?!?! APPLE IS BAILING ON MACWORLD!!!! http://tinyurl.com/6b5m4f
Working the part-time job today. Screen print designs and tech support. Life is good!
Little dude is sick today. 102.5!!!
